availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Abraham Gregory Watts (Jefferson County, Kentucky, almshouse keeper. )

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, almshouse keeper. Kentucky, native. Married to Judith Ayers Watts in Woodford County, Kentucky, on May 15, 1823. Married to Lucinda Robinson Watts in Garrard County on July 18, 1825. Father of Lucinda C. Watts Hummel. Resident in Oldham County in 1850. Keeper of poor house in Jefferson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, Division 1, p. 161B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District 2, p. 44.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Woodford County Marriages, Film #005771997.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Garrard County Marriages, Film #004260348.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #19244.
